revision.text: Possibly: A new practice of physic; wherein The various Diseases incident to the human Body are orderly described, Their Causes assign'd, Their Diagnostics and Prognostics enumerated, and the Regimen proper in each deliver'd..., by Peter Shaw. 2nd ed. 2v. (London : Printed for J. Osborn and T. Longman, at the Ship in Pater-Noster-Row, M.DCC.XXVIII. [1728]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2503423~S1
